telegram.question: How does it work through Telegram?
telegram.answer: Simply add our Synoro bot to your Telegram and start chatting. Send text messages or voice notes about your tasks, expenses, or maintenance activities. Our AI will automatically understand and categorize everything for you.

voice.question: Can I use voice messages?
voice.answer: Yes! Voice messages are fully supported. Simply record a voice note in Telegram describing what you did, bought, or need to remember. Our system will transcribe and process your voice message automatically.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use professional security to protect your data. Your information is stored safely and never shared with other companies. You have full control over your data and can export or delete it at any time.

family.question: How does family sharing work?
family.answer: With the Family plan, multiple family members can log activities to the same account. Each person gets their own Telegram bot access, and you can see combined reports for the entire household.

Hero.title: Your Personal Smart Assistant
Hero.subtitle: Make your daily life easier with smart task management. Considers weather, helps plan purchases and savings.

TelegramCTA.title: Try our Telegram bot right now!
TelegramCTA.subtitle: Start using Synoro through the convenient Telegram interface. Send voice messages, text notes and get smart responses in real time.
TelegramCTA.feature1: Easy to use - send messages like to a regular friend
TelegramCTA.feature2: Voice notes are automatically transcribed and analyzed
TelegramCTA.feature3: Instant responses and smart recommendations from AI
TelegramCTA.bottomText: Don't wait - try Synoro right now in Telegram!

Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: Discover the helpful features that make Synoro the best assistant for your everyday life.

aiIntelligence.title: Artificial Intelligence
aiIntelligence.description: Advanced AI algorithms automatically understand and classify your records, turning chaos into structured information.

smartPlanning.title: Smart Planning
smartPlanning.description: Intelligent planning system that takes into account weather, your habits and financial goals for optimal results.

productivity.title: Productivity & Security
productivity.description: Gamified approach to productivity with enterprise-level security for your personal data.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan to boost your productivity and make life easier.

Footer.description: Your smart assistant for better task management and easier daily life.
Footer.newsletterDescription: Get the latest updates and helpful tips sent to your email.

HowItWorks.title: Simple. Smart. Efficient.
HowItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to improve your productivity and learn more about your daily activities.

step1.title: Tell Us What You Did
step1.description: Simply tell Synoro what you've done. Use voice messages or text - the system understands everyday language perfectly.
points: Speak naturally via text or voice

step2.title: System Organizes
step2.description: The smart system sorts your activities by category, adds timestamps, and finds helpful patterns in your daily routine.

step3.title: Get Helpful Tips
step3.description: Receive personal reports, time-saving suggestions, and smart recommendations to improve your daily life.

WhoBenefits.title: Perfect For Everyone
WhoBenefits.subtitle: See how Synoro makes daily life easier for different people with personalized solutions and helpful insights.

families.title: Families
families.subtitle: Easy home management for busy families

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking Made Simple
expenseTracking.description: "Bought groceries for $85 at the supermarket" - instantly organized and tracked in your family budget with helpful spending tips.

choreManagement.title: Chore Management
choreManagement.description: Track completed household tasks, assign chores to family members, and celebrate achievements with a fun point system.

smartSavings.title: Smart Savings
smartSavings.description: Analyzes family expenses and suggests saving strategies for goals: vacation, renovation, children's education.

successStory.title: Real Family Success
successStory.description: "Synoro helped us save $400/month by tracking our spending habits. The kids love earning points for doing chores!" - Sarah M., Mother of 3

carOwners.title: Car Enthusiasts
carOwners.subtitle: Never miss car maintenance with smart tracking

predictiveMaintenance.title: Smart Maintenance Planning
predictiveMaintenance.description: The system tracks your driving habits and maintenance history to predict when your car needs service, preventing expensive repairs.

costOptimization.title: Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: Track maintenance costs, find the best service deals, and plan your budget for future repairs with smart planning.

testimonial.title: Car Enthusiast Testimonial
testimonial.description: "Synoro saved me $800 by finding a transmission problem early. The maintenance reminders are perfect!" - Mike R., Daily Driver

homeowners.title: Builders & Craftsmen
homeowners.subtitle: Professional planning for construction and renovation projects

maintenanceScheduling.title: Construction Stage Planning
maintenanceScheduling.description: "Poured foundation for 6x8 meter house, used 12 cubic meters of concrete" - system automatically plans next stages: waterproofing, wall masonry, floor slabs.

seasonalReminders.title: Weather Planning for Outdoor Work
seasonalReminders.description: Get smart reminders: reschedule facade painting during rain, plan roofing work in dry weather, consider temperature for concrete work.

successStory.title: Craftsman Success
successStory.description: "With Synoro I save $600/month on stage planning and material purchases. 120 sq.m house delivered 2 weeks ahead of schedule!" - Michael S., Foreman

timeTracking.title: Time & Project Tracking
timeTracking.description: "Finished client website design - 4 hours" - automatically organizes work time, tracks project progress, and calculates earnings.

healthWellness.title: Health & Wellness
healthWellness.description: Track work breaks, exercise routines, and wellness check-ins to maintain good productivity and well-being.

successStory.title: Self-Employed Success
successStory.description: "Synoro helped me increase my hourly rate by 40% through better time tracking and productivity insights. Amazing!" - Alex K., Graphic Designer

gardeners.title: Gardeners & Gardeners
gardeners.subtitle: Smart planning of garden work and plant care

seasonalPlanning.title: Seasonal Planning
seasonalPlanning.description: "Planted tomatoes in the greenhouse" - the system will remind you about watering, fertilizing and harvesting at optimal times.

plantCare.title: Plant Care
plantCare.description: Track watering schedules, fertilizing and pest control for each type of plant in your garden.

weatherSmart.title: Weather Consideration
weatherSmart.description: Automatically reschedules outdoor work during rain, reminds about frost preparation and considers forecasts for watering.

successStory.title: Gardener Success Story
successStory.description: "With Synoro, my harvest doubled! I never miss important garden maintenance tasks." - Nicholas V., Gardener with 20 years of experience
